title: Diagonal in a Cartesian square
content: Definition of the diagonal in the Cartesian square of a set.

blocks.name: cdiag2
blocks.content: Syntax for the diagonal of the Cartesian square of a set.

df-bj-diag

blocks.name: bj-diagval
blocks.content: Value of the diagonal. (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-diagval(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cdiag2, c0), cin(cid, cxp(c0, c0))))
} = {
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cdiag2, c0), cin(cid, cxp(c0, c0))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cin(cid, cxp(c0, c0)), universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eqelr(cin(cid, cxp(c0, c0)), universe, cin(cxp(c0, c0), cid), wcel(c0, c1))
  incom(cxp(c0, c0), cid)
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cin(cxp(c0, c0), cid), universe), wcel(cxp(c0, c0), universe))
  sqxpexg(c0, c1)
  inex1g(cxp(c0, c0), universe, cid)
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, universe, cin(cid, cxp(c0, c0)), universe, cdiag2, cin(cid, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))))
  ineq2d(cid, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cxp(c0, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sqxpeqd(cv(hs0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  df-bj-diag(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cid, cxp(c0, c0)))
}

blocks.name: bj-eldiag
blocks.content: Characterization of the elements of the diagonal of a Cartesian square. (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-eldiag2
blocks.content: Characterization of the elements of the diagonal of a Cartesian square. (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-eldiag2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cop(c2, c3), cfv(cdiag2, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wceq(c2, c3))))
} = {
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cfv(cdiag2, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wceq(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cin(cid, cxp(c0, c0))))
  eleq2d(cop(c2, c3), cfv(cdiag2, c0), cin(cid, cxp(c0, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  bj-diagval(c0, c1)
  3bitri(wcel(cop(c2, c3), cin(cid, cxp(c0, c0))), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wceq(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(cop(c2, c3), cid), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cxp(c0, c0))), wa(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0))))
  elin(cop(c2, c3), cid, cxp(c0, c0))
  anbi12i(wcel(cop(c2, c3), cid), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cxp(c0, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)))
  bj-elid3(c2, c3)
  opelxp(c2, c3, c0, c0)
  impbii(wa(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0))), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wceq(c2, c3)))
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0))), wcel(c2, c0), wceq(c2, c3))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0))
  simplr(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(c2, c3), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)))
  jca(wa(wcel(c2, c0), wceq(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)))
  anim1i(wcel(c2, c0), wceq(c2, c3), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c2, c0)
  imdistani(wcel(c2, c0), wceq(c2, c3), wcel(c3, c0))
  biimpcd(wcel(c2, c0), wceq(c2, c3), wcel(c3, c0))
  eleq1(c2, c3, c0)
}

} = {

  elin(< c2, c3 >, cid, (c0 Ã— c0))

  bj-elid3(c2, c3)
  opelxp(c2, c3, c0, c0)
  impbii(((c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c2 = c3)âˆ§(c2 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ c3 âˆˆ c0)), (c2 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ c2 = c3))
  jca(((c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c2 = c3)âˆ§(c2 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ c3 âˆˆ c0)), c2 âˆˆ c0, c2 = c3)
  simprl((c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c2 = c3), c2 âˆˆ c0, c3 âˆˆ c0)
  simplr(c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c2 = c3, (c2 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ c3 âˆˆ c0))
  jca((c2 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ c2 = c3), (c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c2 = c3), (c2 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ c3 âˆˆ c0))
  anim1i(c2 âˆˆ c0, c2 = c3, c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  elex(c2, c0)
  imdistani(c2 âˆˆ c0, c2 = c3, c3 âˆˆ c0)
  biimpcd(c2 âˆˆ c0, c2 = c3, c3 âˆˆ c0)
  eleq1(c2, c3, c0)
